title: Kleds Main Influence for his Design
body:

replies.body:
Kled should have a Bandito skin and a Sandstorm skin.

Basically Yosemite Sam riding a Yoshi
Yep.  Now how long will it take to get mudfalps in the merch store with Kled on them?  One can hope XP
This is one of the first things I thought of when I first heard Kled's voice lines. Like, Kled even says, "As you may know, this means war!"
